 * JavaScript files and generates a markdown based on a user-defined template
 */
'use strict'

const Tokenizer = require('./tokenizer')
const Parse = require('./parse')
const Generate = require('./generate')
const fs = require('fs')
const path = require('path')

const test = new Tokenizer('parse.js')
const parse = new Parse(test)
const jsonInfo = parse.getJSON()
const generate = new Generate()
const md = generate.generate(jsonInfo)

console.log(md)
fs.writeFileSync(path.join(__dirname, 'README.md'), md, { flag: 'w' })

// console.log(JSON.stringify(jsonInfo, null, 2))
